unmatched_jd_skills.justification: Industry-standard platform for analog and mixed-signal design and layout verification; critical for CAD engineers.
Important for schematic entry and simulation; CAD engineers should be adept in its use.
Essential for DRC/LVS checks; CAD engineers automate Calibre runs and debug verification errors.
Important for digital place and route; knowledge is critical for CAD automation.
Understanding its flow is vital for building robust CAD automation.
Used for static timing analysis; essential for managing timing flows.
Needed for parasitic extraction post-layout verification.
